\doxysection{sockpp\+::connector Class Reference}
\hypertarget{classsockpp_1_1connector}{}\label{classsockpp_1_1connector}\index{sockpp::connector@{sockpp::connector}}


Class to create a client stream connection.  




{\ttfamily \#include $<$connector.\+h$>$}

\begin{DoxyCompactList}\small\item\em Checks the value of the socket handle, and if invalid, returns the error. \end{DoxyCompactList}\end{DoxyCompactItemize}


\doxysubsection{Detailed Description}
Class to create a client stream connection. 

This is a base class for creating active, streaming sockets that initiate connections to a server. It can be used to derive classes that implement TCP on IPv4 or IPv6.

Attempts to connect to the specified server. 

If the socket is currently connected, this will close the current connection and open the new one.

Attempts to connect to the specified server, with a timeout. 

If the socket is currently connected, this will close the current connection and open the new one. If the operation times out, the last\+\_\+error will be set to {\ttfamily timed\+\_\+out}.

\Hypertarget{classsockpp_1_1connector_a00087323d9f0ac02c8ecbd022de88060}\index{sockpp::connector@{sockpp::connector}!connect@{connect}}
\index{connect@{connect}!sockpp::connector@{sockpp::connector}}
\doxysubsubsection{\texorpdfstring{connect()}{connect()}\hspace{0.1cm}{\footnotesize\ttfamily [3/3]}}
{\footnotesize\ttfamily \label{classsockpp_1_1connector_a00087323d9f0ac02c8ecbd022de88060} 
\mbox{\hyperlink{classsockpp_1_1result}{result}} sockpp\+::connector\+::connect (\begin{DoxyParamCaption}\item[{const \mbox{\hyperlink{classsockpp_1_1sock__address}{sock\+\_\+address}} \&}]{addr}{, }\item[{microseconds}]{timeout}{}\end{DoxyParamCaption})}



Attempts to connect to the specified server, with a timeout. 

If the socket is currently connected, this will close the current connection and open the new one. If the operation times out, the \doxylink{result_8h_aa6883af094401dec86cca0137e0b1b60}{error} will be {\ttfamily errc\+::timed\+\_\+out}. 
\begin{DoxyParams}{Parameters}
{\em addr} & The remote server address. \\
\hline
{\em timeout} & The duration after which to give up. Zero means never. \\
\hline
\end{DoxyParams}
\begin{DoxyReturn}{Returns}
The error code on failure. 
\end{DoxyReturn}
